definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: In the past, there is a woman, her husband likes wine excessive drinking.
sentences.chinese: 從前，有一個女人，她丈夫喜歡好酒貪杯。
